header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.source: Your current password will expire in %days% day(s). You can change it in User Settings/My Account Settings.
trans-unit.target: Your current password will expire in %days% day(s). You can change it in User Settings/My Account Settings.

trans-unit.source: Your current password will expire today. You can change it in User Settings/My Account Settings.
trans-unit.target: Your current password will expire today. You can change it in User Settings/My Account Settings.

trans-unit.source: Your password has expired and must be changed. You will receive an email with instructions how to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Your password has expired and must be changed. You will receive an email with instructions how to reset your password.

trans-unit.source: eZ Platform ©1999-%current_year% %ez_link_open%eZ Systems AS%ez_link_close% and others.
trans-unit.target: eZ Platform ©1999-%current_year% %ez_link_open%eZ Systems AS%ez_link_close% and others.

trans-unit.source: You don't have permissions to view this Content item (contentID: %contentId%).
trans-unit.target: You don't have permissions to view this Content item (contentID: %contentId%).

trans-unit.source: To hide the Content item anyway, click Confirm.
trans-unit.target: To hide the Content item anyway, click Confirm.

trans-unit.source: This content is used by other Content item(s). To avoid errors, update or remove all related content listed in the Relations tab.
trans-unit.target: This content is used by other Content item(s). To avoid errors, update or remove all related content listed in the Relations tab.

trans-unit.source: To continue, go back to the dashboard or search for another Content item.
trans-unit.target: To continue, go back to the dashboard or search for another Content item.

trans-unit.source:
Error 403: you don't have permissions to access this page.
Contact your Administrator to request access to this content.
trans-unit.target:
Error 403: you don't have permissions to access this page.
Contact your Administrator to request access to this content.

trans-unit.source: You don't have permission for this page.
trans-unit.target: You don't have permission for this page.

trans-unit.source:
Check the URL for a typo and try again.
Otherwise, go back to the dashboard or search for another Content item.
trans-unit.target:
Check the URL for a typo and try again.
Otherwise, go back to the dashboard or search for another Content item.

trans-unit.source:
Error 404: the page you requested was not found.
It might have been deleted or it is temporarily unavailable.
trans-unit.target:
Error 404: the page you requested was not found.
It might have been deleted or it is temporarily unavailable.

trans-unit.source:
Contact your Administrator and inform them about the time the error occurred, the URL in your browser window, and anything related that you think may have caused the error.
You can also go back or try to reload the application.
trans-unit.target:
Contact your Administrator and inform them about the time the error occurred, the URL in your browser window, and anything related that you think may have caused the error.
You can also go back or try to reload the application.

trans-unit.source: Error 500: internal server error. The server was unable to complete your request because of an internal problem.
trans-unit.target: Error 500: internal server error. The server was unable to complete your request because of an internal problem.

trans-unit.source: If you do not remember your login, contact your Administrator.
trans-unit.target: If you do not remember your login, contact your Administrator.

trans-unit.source: This email is connected with several accounts. Enter your login instead.
trans-unit.target: This email is connected with several accounts. Enter your login instead.

trans-unit.source:
Hi,

We have received a request to reset the password for your eZ Platform account. Click “reset password” below to choose a new password:

Reset password

If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email, and your password will remain the same.
trans-unit.target:
Hi,

We have received a request to reset the password for your eZ Platform account. Click “reset password” below to choose a new password:

Reset password

If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email, and your password will remain the same.

trans-unit.source:
An email has been sent to the address you provided with instructions on how to reset your password.

If the email is slow to arrive, check your spam folders.

If you don't receive an email, make sure you've entered the address you registered with, and check your spam folder.

If you reset your password multiple times, only the most recent email link will be valid.
trans-unit.target:
An email has been sent to the address you provided with instructions on how to reset your password.

If the email is slow to arrive, check your spam folders.

If you don't receive an email, make sure you've entered the address you registered with, and check your spam folder.

If you reset your password multiple times, only the most recent email link will be valid.

trans-unit.source: This link is not valid anymore, you can generate a new link to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: This link is not valid anymore, you can generate a new link to reset your password.

trans-unit.source: Your password has been changed. You can log in to eZ Platform.
trans-unit.target: Your password has been changed. You can log in to eZ Platform.

trans-unit.source: I understand the consequences of this action.
trans-unit.target: I understand the consequences of this action.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to delete the Section(s)?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to delete the Section(s)?

trans-unit.source: Swap the Content item at this Location with another
trans-unit.target: Swap the Content item at this Location with another

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to permanently delete %trashItemsCount% item(s)?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to permanently delete %trashItemsCount% item(s)?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to send this Content item to Trash?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to send this Content item to Trash?

trans-unit.source: If you wish to delete these assets too, first make sure they are not used by other content. To check, go to the asset preview and look at its content Relations in the Relations tab.
trans-unit.target: If you wish to delete these assets too, first make sure they are not used by other content. To check, go to the asset preview and look at its content Relations in the Relations tab.

trans-unit.source: You are about to delete a Content item that has one or more asset Field(s) used by other Content items. These assets will remain available in system.
trans-unit.target: You are about to delete a Content item that has one or more asset Field(s) used by other Content items. These assets will remain available in system.

trans-unit.source: '%content_name%' has 1 or more asset Field(s). You have an option to send only the Content item to Trash, or to send the Content item and its assets to Trash. Please select your option:
trans-unit.target: '%content_name%' has 1 or more asset Field(s). You have an option to send only the Content item to Trash, or to send the Content item and its assets to Trash. Please select your option:

trans-unit.source: Sending '%content_name%' and its %children_count% Content item(s) to Trash will also send the sub-items of this Location to Trash.
trans-unit.target: Sending '%content_name%' and its %children_count% Content item(s) to Trash will also send the sub-items of this Location to Trash.

trans-unit.source: '%content_name%' is in use by %reverse_relations% Content item(s). You should remove all reverse Relations before deleting the Content item.
trans-unit.target: '%content_name%' is in use by %reverse_relations% Content item(s). You should remove all reverse Relations before deleting the Content item.
